statements: DELETE FROM voter_registration_information WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND date_of_birth = '1990-05-15';
DELETE FROM voter_registration_information WHERE date_of_birth = '1990-05-25' AND address = '123 Main St';
DELETE FROM voter_history WHERE registration_status = 'INACTIVE' AND registration_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM voter_records WHERE registration_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM voter_records WHERE voter_id = 1001 AND registration_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM voter_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM voting_centers WHERE district_id = 3 AND center_location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1 AND voter_age < 25;
DELETE FROM voter_addresses WHERE state = 'NY' AND city = 'New York';
